verses.text_plain: After these things the word of the Lord came unto Abram in a vision, saying, Fear not, Abram: I am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.
verses.verse_html: 1After these things the word of the Lord came unto Abram in a vision, saying, Fear not, Abram: I am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.

verses.text_plain: And Abram said, Lord God, what wilt thou give me, seeing I go childless, and the steward of my house is this Eliezer of Damascus?
verses.verse_html: 2And Abram said, Lord God, what wilt thou give me, seeing I go childless, and the steward of my house is this Eliezer of Damascus?

verses.text_plain: And Abram said, Behold, to me thou hast given no seed: and, lo, one born in my house is mine heir.
verses.verse_html: 3And Abram said, Behold, to me thou hast given no seed: and, lo, one born in my house is mine heir.

tokens.text: Behold, to me thou hast given

verses.text_plain: And, behold, the word of the Lord came unto him, saying, This shall not be thine heir; but he that shall come forth out of thine own bowels shall be thine heir.
verses.verse_html: 4And, behold, the word of the Lord came unto him, saying, This shall not be thine heir; but he that shall come forth out of thine own bowels shall be thine heir.

tokens.text: This shall not be thine heir
but he that shall come forth

verses.text_plain: And he brought him forth abroad, and said, Look now toward heaven, and tell the stars, if thou be able to number them: and he said unto him, So shall thy seed be.
verses.verse_html: 5And he brought him forth abroad, and said, Look now toward heaven, and tell the stars, if thou be able to number them: and he said unto him, So shall thy seed be.

verses.text_plain: And he believed in the Lord; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 6And he believed in the Lord; and he counted it to him for righteousness.

verses.text_plain: And he said unto him, I am the Lord that brought thee out of Ur of the Chaldees, to give thee this land to inherit it.
verses.verse_html: 7And he said unto him, I am the Lord that brought thee out of Ur of the Chaldees, to give thee this land to inherit it.

verses.text_plain: And he said, Lord God, whereby shall I know that I shall inherit it?
verses.verse_html: 8And he said, Lord God, whereby shall I know that I shall inherit it?

verses.text_plain: And he said unto him, Take me an heifer of three years old, and a she goat of three years old, and a ram of three years old, and a turtledove, and a young pigeon.
verses.verse_html: 9And he said unto him, Take me an heifer of three years old, and a she goat of three years old, and a ram of three years old, and a turtledove, and a young pigeon.

verses.text_plain: And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.
verses.verse_html: 10And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.

tokens.text: unto him all these, and divided

verses.text_plain: And when the fowls came down upon the carcases, Abram drove them away.
verses.verse_html: 11And when the fowls came down upon the carcases, Abram drove them away.

verses.text_plain: And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.
verses.verse_html: 12And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.

verses.text_plain: And he said unto Abram, Know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;
verses.verse_html: 13And he said unto Abram, Know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;

verses.text_plain: And also that nation, whom they shall serve, will I judge: and afterward shall they come out with great substance.
verses.verse_html: 14And also that nation, whom they shall serve, will I judge: and afterward shall they come out with great substance.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.
verses.verse_html: 15And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.

verses.text_plain: But in the fourth generation they shall come hither again: for the iniquity of the Amorites is not yet full.
verses.verse_html: 16But in the fourth generation they shall come hither again: for the iniquity of the Amorites is not yet full.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
verses.verse_html:
17And it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
 a burning: Heb. a lamp of fire

tokens.text: And it came to pass, that, when the sun

footnotes.body_text: a burning: Heb. a lamp of fire
footnotes.body_html: a burning: Heb. a lamp of fire

verses.text_plain: In the same day the Lord made a covenant with Abram, saying, Unto thy seed have I given this land, from the river of Egypt unto the great river, the river Euphrates:
verses.verse_html: 18In the same day the Lord made a covenant with Abram, saying, Unto thy seed have I given this land, from the river of Egypt unto the great river, the river Euphrates:

verses.text_plain: The Kenites, and the Kenizzites, and the Kadmonites,
verses.verse_html: 19The Kenites, and the Kenizzites, and the Kadmonites,

verses.text_plain: And the Hittites, and the Perizzites, and the Rephaims,
verses.verse_html: 20And the Hittites, and the Perizzites, and the Rephaims,

verses.text_plain: And the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Girgashites, and the Jebusites.
verses.verse_html: 21And the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Girgashites, and the Jebusites.
